name: Detray Aviation
about: Detray Aviation, located at the Port Bucyrus/Crawford County Airport (17G) in Bucyrus, Ohio, has been serving the aviation community since 1981. As a Fixed Base Operator (FBO), we provide a range of services including fuel, approach and departure services, and aircraft maintenance. We specialize in the sale of various aircraft models such as Beechcraft, Cessna, Grumman, Mooney, and Piper. Our commitment to customer service and quality has made us a trusted name in the Heartland. For over four decades, we have been dedicated to supporting pilots and aviation enthusiasts with our comprehensive services and expertise. Contact us at (419) 562-7596 or visit www.detrayaviation.com for more information. We look forward to serving your aviation needs.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
